main.name: Emma Líf Jónsdóttir
main.description: graduated from the University of Iceland. I am a positive person and a progressive thinker that is looking for a job in an outstanding team to work with
main.bio: Originally I grew up on a farm near Egilsstaðir in East Iceland. I am half australian and have an australian citizenship, and when I was 14 years old I moved there with my family. Moved back to Iceland when I was suppose to begin in Upper Seconday School. As soon as I graduated I moved to Denmark to chase my hobbies where I attended a sports school. I got home after a year and then I enrolled to the University of Iceland.
main.bio1: Since I can remember I have been participating in gymnastics and it's my main hobby, I practiced it for a long time. Since I started in upper secondary school I have been coaching competitive gymnastic teams and travelled the country to attend competitions. I got a gymnastics judges certificate and today I am a well respected gymnastics judge. Throughout my childhood I practiced chess and I was considered very good at it considering I won many trophies. When I was young I did alot of horse riding and spent my summers guiding tourists on the highland.
main.bio2: Now I have found a new hobby - programming. I have emendous ambition for everything that is related to building software, but my favourite thing to do is building websites.
main.contactmessage: I am very interested on working on challenging projects with a positive and exciting team. Don't hesitate to send me a line.

resume.skillmessage: I love learning new things, and here below is a brief review of my experience with programming languages.

education.description: Moved to Denmark to chase my hobbies and travel the world.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Developed siminn.is using Javascript. Maintained and improved the online store by adding features and imprvoing design.
work.umsogn: Viktor Sterinarsson, Head of software development, phone 820-5685.

work.title: Gymnastics Coach
work.description: Coached competitive gymnastic teams as a part time job with school.
work.umsogn: Kristinn Þór Guðlaugsson, Head Coach at Gerpla, sími 849-4378.

work.title: Foreman
work.description: Summer job where I worked as a foreman to lead 19 youths working in the Kárahnjúkar Area

work.title: Waitress
work.description: Waitressing at the hotels restaurant, working shifts.

skills.name: Java
skills.info: I have alot of experience in Java. Most of my projects from my previous job were implemented in Java. I've made several projets using Java - such as websites, webservices and apps.

skills.name: Javascript
skills.info: My favorite programming language. I've produced many websites using javascript - both from my previous job and from school. I also like to make my own websites using this programming lanugage.

skills.name: Python
skills.info: Simple and a neat programming language which is easy to learn, and I take pleasure in programming in. Main projects I've made using Python are in Natural Language Processing .

skills.name: React
skills.info: It is great too use React when making websites, and I love working with it, for example is this website made in React. I also have experience using Next.js, Express and Apollo.

skills.name: C++
skills.info: I have a basic understanding with C++. It's not my favorite programming language but it's enjoyable to make fast solutions on projects using it.

skills.name: Java Spring
skills.info: I have used the Java Spring framwork alot in my projects. It's a neat tool to use in large Java projects and it's easy to use when implementing webservices.

skills.name: Git
skills.info: One of my favorite programming tools because it smplifies all teamwork. I have alot of experience working in Git and I am very used to using this tool.

skills.name: SQL
skills.info: I use SQL alot when it comes to working with databases. I have used many different types of SQL such as PostreSQL, SQLite and I have also experience in GraphQL.
